EmailTemplate.subject: Cancel Registered Agent Services
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We have received your request to cancel your Registered Agent Services with LegalZoom. It is required that your Business Entity maintain a Registered Agent with a corresponding in-state, physical address. In order for us to complete your request, you will need to complete the following steps:
• Elect a new Registered Agent and file the necessary paperwork with the State office. • Send a copy of the recorded Change of Registered Agent filing to LegalZoom (support@legalzoom.com) • Contact us directly at {!snippetVariable.ccphone}
Once we receive the copy of change has been made, please contact us directly and we will be happy to complete your cancellation request.
Please feel free to contact our Registered Agent Team at (888) 381-8758 Monday – Friday 6am-7pm PT, or Saturday 10am-2pm PT. You could also simply reply to this email with any further questions or concerns.
Thank you again for choosing LegalZoom and we look forward to hearing from you soon.
Best Regards,
The LegalZoom Team
